attributes.action: make it impossible for people to sign these petitions other than with their names.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The large number of frivolous signatures to petitions, often by persons who clearly do not support the goals of these petitions, undermines the whole enterprise. By restricting signatures to individual names, and asking for confirmation of these names, the system will gain.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
